title: SL‑NET VPN Client
summary: Windows VPN client supporting OpenSSL protocols (SSH/TLS, Vless, Vmess) with a simple UI.
problem: Users needed an easy, unified VPN client to configure and connect via popular secure protocols.
solution: Built a VB.NET desktop client with profile management, protocol selection, and status feedback, leveraging OpenSSL for secure transport.
result: Simplified secure connectivity for non‑technical users; faster setup and reliable connections.

title: Uni Downloader (VM)
summary: Cross‑platform downloader packaged with step‑by‑step VM setup for consistent performance.
problem: Inconsistent environments caused failures and slow performance for media downloads.
solution: Provided a guided VM environment and Java tools with LLVM components to ensure predictable downloads and updates.
result: Reliable downloads across systems; reduced environment issues and support workload.

title: Isuru’s VC — GPU Video Converter
summary: GPU‑accelerated video converter and high compression desktop tool for Windows.
problem: CPU‑only converters were too slow for large video workloads.
solution: Leveraged GPU encoding pipelines with an easy UI and preset management; batch processing support.
result: Large speedups vs CPU encoders; streamlined conversion workflow for end users.

title: Isuru’s IC — Image Converter + Downloader
summary: All‑in‑one Windows tool for converting image formats and downloading assets.
problem: Designers and students needed quick image conversions without complex tools.
solution: Built a simple VB.NET desktop app supporting common formats, batch conversion, and basic download helpers.
result: Faster image workflows; reduced reliance on heavy suites for simple tasks.

title: Shutdown Scheduler
summary: Windows utility to schedule shutdown, restart, and sleep operations.
problem: Users needed automated power actions for downloads, maintenance, and energy savings.
solution: Created a VB.NET UI to schedule and manage system actions with clear status and cancellation options.
result: Reduced idle power usage and improved convenience; simple automation for everyday tasks.
